title: Stalk
overview: Lux, 18, is a gifted young man who is humiliated by the coolest students on campus as soon as he arrives at his prestigious engineering school. To take revenge, he "stalke" them by interfering remotely in their phones and computers, including that of Alma, the object of all his fantasies. Lux discovers all their secrets and integrates their group to better handle them. He becomes in the eyes of everyone who he always dreamed of being, but for how long?
